abstract: Retired New York City Police Officer Michael Rizzi is charged with running BJM/Manhattan Stakes and Entertainment, multimillion-dollar online escort service catering to wealthy clients, in many cases out of major Manhattan hotels; Rizzi has been charged in past with aiding illegal gambling.
lead_paragraph: Michael Rizzi was charged with money-laundering in connection with a multimillion-dollar online service that catered to clients at major Manhattan hotels.

headline.main: Ex-New York Police Officer Accused of Running Prostitution Ring
headline.print_headline: Retired Officer Ran a Multimillion-Dollar Prostitution Ring, Prosecutors Say

snippet: Michael Rizzi was charged with money-laundering in connection with a multimillion-dollar online service that catered to clients at major Manhattan hotels.
